issue.title: [Packaging] crossbow status should output shortened log URLs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2932](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2932). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Would be nice to be able to easily get to the logs of a particular task. Right now I have to click through GitHub stuff.

I'll have a patch up for this shortly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2932?focusedCommentId=16657286) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Don't shortened URLs require a 3rdparty url shortener service? 
It might be better to fetch and display the logs instead -> https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2933

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2932?focusedCommentId=16657506) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We inevitably will need to create a small web application to be a dashboard for crossbow nightly builds etc. This could also fetch and display logs

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2932?focusedCommentId=17565820) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
